about_the_game:
Do you prefer doing the drawing or the guessing? Perhaps your friends are atrocious at drawing, they don’t appreciate your artistic talent, or maybe you just don’t have any friends.

Regardless, guess hundreds of pre-drawn words, or alternatively, create your own level packs for other people to play and rate.

No drawing required

With all the drawings provided, in addition to community submissions, you’ll have plenty of guessing to do!

No guessing required!

If you prefer the drawing part of the game, just use the built in editor to create your own level packs to share on the workshop, where people can rate and give feedback, all from within the app.

Unlimited hints

If you type a similar word, perhaps with a typo, it will tell you that you’re close. But if that’s not enough, you can press CTRL + H at any time for a hint or press the onscreen hint button. It will reveal the word letter by letter for each press.

Take your time

There is no time pressure whatsoever, but in case you’re curious, your time spent guessing will be displayed for each level.

Level editor

A lot of consideration went into the level editor to best assist your doodling:
- Outlines always render on top of colour, so you don’t have to think about layer management.
- Includes a carefully selected striking colour palette that will make your shading pop
- Autosaves so your work is constantly preserved
- Allows for unlimited undos
